trans-unit.source: Provides access to a control designer to store temporary design-time data associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取權來儲存暫存控制項相關聯的設計階段資料的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The property and methods defined in the IControlDesignerAccessor interface offer a convenient way for the control designer to access a control for passing and retrieving temporary design-time data.
trans-unit.target: IControlDesignerAccessor 介面中定義的方法與屬性提供便利的方式來存取傳送和擷取暫存的設計階段資料的控制項的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 介面是由<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>實作

trans-unit.source: Control designers use the implementation of this interface to access the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項設計工具會使用這個介面的實作來存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: Temporary design-time data is not persisted with the control itself.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項本身不會保存暫存的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: To persist design-time data for a control, you should retrieve the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IControlDesignerAccessor.UserData%2A> property and store them in a designer-specific location.
trans-unit.target: 若要保存控制項的設計階段資料，您應該擷取的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.IControlDesignerAccessor.UserData%2A>屬性並將其儲存在特定的設計工具的位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.IControlDesignerAccessor.UserData%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets the state from the control during use on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，取得從控制項的狀態，在設計介面上使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is used only by control designers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的控制項狀態。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When implemented, sets control state before rendering it on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，會在設計介面上呈現之前設定控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: In overridden controls, this method is used to retain and set state for the control during design-time mode.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫控制項中，這個方法用來保留並在設計階段模式下設定控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used only by control designers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含的控制項狀態。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: When implemented, specifies the control that acts as the owner to the control implementing this method.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，指定的控制項，可做為要實作這個方法的控制項的擁有者。

trans-unit.source: In a composite container scenario where one control contains another control, the container is the control owner.
trans-unit.target: 在複合容器案例中其中一個控制項包含另一個控制項，容器是控制項的擁有人。

trans-unit.source: The control to act as owner.
trans-unit.target: 要做為擁有者的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When implemented, gets a collection of information that can be accessed by a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，取得集合的控制項設計工具可以存取的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A control's properties and content can be persisted, so that the control maintains state in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的屬性和內容就會保留，使控制項維持在設計階段環境中的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only by control designers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性僅供控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing information about the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含控制項的相關資訊。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
